ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection and Health.
This item gives the owner an aura of physical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Allied gods within 70 units have their Physical Protections increased by 15 and their HP5 increased by 25.

ItemDescription.Description: This item deals damage to nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - ALL enemies within 25 units are dealt 40 Magical Damage per second.

ShortDesc: Nearby enemies take damage over time.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes attackers to have a chance to be slowed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies that successfully land a basic attack  on you have their Movement Speed and Attack Speed reduced by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times and can stack with other item slow effects.

ShortDesc: Slow enemies when hit by their Basic Attacks

ItemDescription.Description: When in range of an enemy structure, that structure's Attack Speed is reduced by 30%. When in range of an ally structure, that structures has its Attack Speed increased by 40%.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
AURA - Damageable enemy structures within 55 units have their Attack Speed reduced by 30%.
Damageable allied structures within 55 units have their Attack Speed increased by 40%.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical Power on use.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical Power by 60 and Cooldown Reduction by 10% for 5 minutes or until you are killed. Also, damaging enemy gods with an ability returns 3% of your maximum Mana. This effect can occur once for each god hit with the ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases Physical Power on use.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Physical Power by 30 for 5 minutes or until you are killed. Also, your abilities deal bonus damage of 15% of your Physical Power to gods. This effect can occur once for each god hit with the ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Increased Attack Speed and Power.
This item gives increased Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 25% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Lifesteal when at low Health

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 12% for 3 seconds (max. 3 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Basic Attacks to deal a percentage of the target's Health as additional damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - On Basic Attack hits, deal Physical Damage equal to 3% of the target's maximum Health. If the target has over 2000 Health, the bonus damage scales up. This effect reaches a maximum of 5% of the targets Maximum Health at 2750 Health.

ShortDesc: Bonus damage based on target's maximum Health

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives increased Physical Lifesteal when at low Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - If you drop below 35% Health, you gain an additional 30% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

ShortDesc: Gain Physical Lifesteal when at low Health

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Lifesteal.
This item gives the owner an aura of Lifesteal and Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Allied gods within 70 units have their Magical Lifesteal increased by 12% and their Magical Power increased by 30 or their Physical Lifesteal increased by 10% and their Physical Power increased by 20.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Magical Power and Lifesteal based on the percentage of the owner's missing Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 100 power and 20% Lifesteal at 25% Health.

ShortDesc: Gain Magical Power as Health is lost

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Healing obtained from Magical Lifesteal is increased by 40%. Your Magical power is increased by twice the amount of Magical Lifesteal you have.

ItemDescription.Description: Consume stacks to deal bonus damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - On successful hit of an Ability you gain 1 stack. At 4 Stacks your next Ability that damages an enemy God will deal bonus damage equal to 30% of your Magical power to each God hit, and will heal yourself and allies within 20 units for 40% of your Magical Power and will consume the 4 stacks.

ShortDesc: Build stacks to get bonus damage and healing

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals you over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 250 Health over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 150 Mana over 25 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 45 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Power by 25% and increases damage done to Structures by 25% for 6 minutes. This effect persists through death.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Magical and Physical Protections by 50 and decreases damage taken from Structures by 25% for 6 minutes. This effect persists through death.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Penetration.
This item grants the owner physical penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE -  Your Physical Damage ignores 15% of enemy gods' Physical Protection.

PASSIVE - Your Physical Damage ignores 15% of enemy gods' Physical Protection. If the god has over 65 Physical Protections, this effect scales up to ignore a larger percentage of their protection. This caps at 40% Physical Penetration at 200 or more Physical Protection.

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the healing and regeneration of your target.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your Abilities have 40% reduced healing and regeneration for 8 seconds.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner reduced cooldown on their abilities.
This item grants the owner Physical Penetration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Enemies hit by your damaging Abilities take an additional 20 Physical Damage + 15% of your Physical Power over 2s.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Mana.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For 8 seconds after using an ability, your next basic attack will deal an additional 10% damage. The effect can only occur every 3 seconds.

ShortDesc: Using abilities gives your next Basic Attack bonus damage based on Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Mana on kills and converts your Mana to additional Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 15 Mana per Stack, and receive 5 Stacks for a god kill, and 1 Stack for a minion kill (max. 50 stacks). Additionally, 3% of your Mana is converted to Physical Power.

ShortDesc: Gain Stacks of Mana from kills and converts Mana to Physical Power

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner bonus damage on the next Basic Attack after using an ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
PASSIVE - For 8s after using an ability, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 50% damage. Abilities that function like basic attacks do not benefit from this.
PASSIVE - This item grants 2.5 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana.

ShortDesc: Using abilities gives your next Basic Attack bonus damage based on Physical Power

ItemDescription.Description: Your abilities deal bonus damage based on targets health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal an additional 3% of the targets maximum Health as Physical Damage. If you have over 200 Physical Power, your ability bonus damage scales up. This effect reaches a maximum of 6% Maximum Health damage at 400 Physical Power.

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item is for Magical users and gives them a chance to gain Health and Mana.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemies with an ability gives you bonus 6 health and 3 mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability.

ShortDesc: Starter item for Mages that provides sustain

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 8 Health and 4 Mana. Basic Attacks that hit all enemies in melee range restore 4 Health and 2 Mana on every enemy after the first.

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks restore Health and Mana.

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item increases durability.

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements and other wards within 45 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time.
PASSIVE - Being within assist range of a minion or jungle camp monster death without dealing the killing blow awards 5 bonus gold, and also restores +12 Health and +10 Mana.

ShortDesc: Bonus Gold, Health, and Mana on minion assist.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots grant bonus speed while out of combat.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain +20% additional Movement Speed after leaving the Fountain. This effect lasts 7s.

This item gives the owner increased Critical Strike Chance and damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Critical Strike bonus damage dealt is increased by 30%.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases Critical Strike Chance after a kill or assist.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing or getting an assist on an enemy god gives you 1 stack. Each stack provides 2% Critical Strike Chance. Stacks are permanent and stack up to 5 times.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases your Critical Strike Chance. Critical Strikes empower your abilities.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Successfully Hitting an Enemy God with a Critical Strike will subtract 3s from all of your abilities currently on Cooldown, except your Ultimate ability. This effect can only happen once every 5s.

ItemDescription.Description: Grants Physical Lifesteal.
This item gives the owner additional physical power and lifesteal.

At 75 Stacks Soul Eater Evolves, gaining +20 Physical Power and allowing your Physical abilities to heal you for 15% of the damage dealt.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power and Lifesteal as they build Stacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy god or minion gives you stacks of +.5 Physical Power and +.2% Physical Lifesteal. You receive 5 stacks for a god kill and 1 stack for a minion kill. Stacks up to 70 times.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Physical Power and Physical Lifesteal every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy god forges a shield from their blood with Health equal to 200 + 10 per Player Level for 20s. While the Blood Shield is active you gain +10% movement speed.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime you hit an Enemy with a Basic Attack you are healed for 1% of your maximum Health and Mana. Basic Attacks that hit multiple enemies will restore 0.5% of your maximum Health and Mana after the first.

Each stack provides 10% of 100 Health +5 Per Level.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants the owner Damage Mitigation when hit by a hard Crowd Control Effect.

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner stacking Protections.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Relics provide special powers available to all gods. Your first Relic is free at Level 1 and your Second Relic is unlocked once you reach Level 12.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 20% for 5s and makes them immune to Slows. Cooldown - 140s

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 units by 50% for 10s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 180s.

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The  relics Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters.

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 55 units away instantly. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Cooldown - 160s.

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 200s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied tower. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75 Health + 12 Health per level and 30% Mana to all Allied gods within 35 units. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item applies a shield to themselves and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 40% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5s, back to its owner as Magical Damage. If you are dealt 150 * your level damage while this effect is active, the effect will end early. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit dealing 15% of the target's Current Health as True Damage. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for 5s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is also reduced by 15% for the duration. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this restores 40% Health and Mana lost within the last 5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item grants all allied gods within 70 units 10% Increased Damage dealt to all targets, including objectives, and 15% Attack Speed increase for 5 seconds. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Cooldown - 130s.

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 20% for 5s, makes them immune to Slows, and grants Haste causing them to be immune to Basic Attack Movement Penalty.  Cooldown - 140s

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 55 units away instantly. After using this item you gain a 10% Damage Mitigation Buff for 2s. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 units by 50% for 10s. Enemies that are healed while affected by this curse take 20% more damage from all sources for the duration of the curse. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item restores 75 Health + 12 Health per level and 30% Mana to all Allied gods within 35 units. Allies affected by Meditation Cloak have their abilities' mana cost reduced by 30% and their Ability Cooldowns reduced by 1s upon use. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Ghostwalk and Damage Reduction Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you and allied gods within 35 units to pass through players and player made objects for 10s. It also provides a 15% Damage Mitigation Buff for 5s. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Protections and Damage Mitigation Buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item applies a shield to himself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies receive 2 stacks of Block, absorbing the next 2 Basic Attacks. Cooldown - 150s.

ItemDescription.Description: Fires True Damage Projectile.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item fires a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first god hit dealing 15% of the target's Current Health as True Damage and increasing their damage taken by 20% for 5s. Cooldown - 110s.

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied tower. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied tower or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 200s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied tower or ward. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 40% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 40% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5 seconds, back to its owner as Magical Damage. If you are dealt 150 * your level damage while this effect is active, the effect will end early. While this is active enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item deals 300 +10 per God Level damage to a single enemy minion, jungle monster or jungle boss within 15 units. The target will be the one with the highest maximum health. The relics Cooldown will be reduced by 30s if you kill a jungle mob with it. Also Stuns enemy gods in range for 1s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Deals damage to minions and jungle monsters. Stuns enemy gods.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is reduced by 25% for the duration. Additionally, their Damage Dealt is reduced by 15%. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item subtracts 3s from all abilities currently on Cooldown and restores 40% Health and Mana lost within the last 5s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Reduces ability Cooldowns and heals Mana and Health.

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item grants all allied gods within 70 units 10% Increased Damage dealt to all targets, including objectives, and 15% Attack Speed increase for 8 seconds. While active they also gain +10 Penetration. Cooldown - 120s.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Protection and Health.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Regenerates 0.2% of your max. Health every second.

ItemDescription.Description: This item grants CC immunity after Knockups.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
PASSIVE - If you are hit by a Knockup, Knockback, Pull, or Grab you gain 15% of your maximum Health over the next 5 seconds. Can only occur once every 45s.

PASSIVE - Regenerates 0.3% of your max. Health every second.

ItemDescription.Description: This item provides a movement speed boost after healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - After healing yourself from an ability, you gain +40% movement speed for 4 seconds. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

ShortDesc: Provides a movement speed boost after healing.

ItemDescription.Description: This item regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - You gain 15% of your maximum Health and Mana over the next 5 seconds when you get a kill or assist against an enemy god or Objective.

ShortDesc: Regenerates Health and Mana on a kill or assist.

ItemDescription.Description: This item increases allied protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Assists on a minion give 1 Stack and God kills and assists give 5 Stacks. Stacks provide 1 Physical and Magical Protection. At 50 Stacks this item evolves, providing an Aura of 10 Physical Protection and 10 Magical Protection.

ShortDesc: Gain increased Protections on Assists and enemy God deaths

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your Critical Hits increase your Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 20% for 5s.

ShortDesc: Critical Hits give increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Critical Hits to weaken Enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Critical hits on enemy gods afflict them with poison for 2s. This poison slows them by 15% and reduces their damage output by 15%.

ShortDesc: Critical Hits reduce Enemy's Movement Speed and Damage

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This item and all upgrades are only available to Assassins and Warriors.

ItemDescription.Description: Physical Power and Penetration.
This item causes your Basic Attacks to reduce the target's Physical Protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decreases enemy Physical protections by 10, and increase your physical protection by 10 for 3s (max. 3 Stacks).

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks reduce target's Physical Protection

ItemDescription.Description: Gain Protections when near other Gods.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For each enemy god within 55 units of you, you gain a stacking buff that provides 7 Magical Protection and 7 Physical Protection. Stacks up to 5 times.

ShortDesc: Gain Protections when near other Gods

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner increased movement speed and attack speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack grants Haste for 1s, causing you to be immune from Basic Attack Movement Penalty.

ShortDesc: Successful Basic Attacks no longer slow

ItemDescription.Description: This item causes the owner's Basic Attacks to hit nearby enemies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - All Basic Attacks will also hit enemies within a 15 unit radius of the target for 50% of the damage to Gods, 75% damage to Minions and Jungle Camps.

ShortDesc: Basic Attack hits damage additional enemies

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Protection.
Magical Protection.
Magical Protection and Cooldown Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When you take Magical Damage from Abilities your cooldowns are reduced by 3s. This can only occur once every 30s.

ShortDesc: Magical Protection and situational Cooldown Reduction

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Protection and Crowd Control Reduction.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - For each enemy God within 55 units of you, you gain a stack of 3% damage mitigation. This caps at 3 stacks.

ShortDesc: Gives defensive bonuses for fighting near multiple enemies

ItemDescription.Description: Attack Speed Aura.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Allied gods within 70 units have their Attack Speed increased by 20%.
This item can be upgraded from anywhere and replaces Boots for Ratatoskr.

ItemDescription.Description: These boots give the owner high Physical Power.
This acorn heals Ratatoskr upon hitting an Enemy with an Ability.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime Ratatoskr uses an ability that successfully hits any target, he is healed.

ShortDesc: Heals Ratatoskr upon hitting an Enemy with an Ability.

ItemDescription.Description: Hit an enemy with this!
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Hit an enemy with this!

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals you over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 250 Health over 25 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Restores Health over time, can be refilled in Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable heals 150 Mana over 25 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold

ShortDesc: Restores Mana over time, can be refilled in Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: This is a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable places a ward that allows you to see normal enemy movements with 45 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. It remains for 3 minutes or until killed. Comes with 2 uses that are refilled in Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Detects enemies, can be refilled in Fountain

ItemDescription.Description: Magical Power and Magical Protection.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Magical Protection reduced by 8.

ShortDesc: Reduces the Magical Protection of enemies

ItemDescription.Description: Aura reducing enemy Physical Power.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Successfully hitting an enemy god with Crowd Control will place a debuff on the enemy, reducing their Magical and Physical Protections by 15 for 5s.

ShortDesc: Magical Power and Protections item for CC heavy gods

ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner an aura that reduces magical protections.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: AURA - Enemy gods within 55 units have their Magical Protection reduced by 15.

ShortDesc: Aura reduces magical protection on enemies

ItemDescription.Description: Anytime you would be dealt more than 20% of your Max Health by a single Magical ability, that damage is instead reduced by 10%.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Anytime you would be dealt more than 20% of your Max Health by a single Magical ability, that damage is instead reduced by 10%.

ShortDesc: Reduces the the damage of Magical abilities that would deal 20% of your Max HP

ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Being in range of minion or jungle camp death without dealing the killing the blow restores 5 Health and 5 Mana to all allies within 55 units and also provides allies with a stacking self buff of 1% Movement Speed and 1% Attack Speed. Lasts 6s and stacks up to 10 times.

ShortDesc: Starter item for physical gods playing as supports

ItemDescription.Description: This starting item reduces your cooldowns when you are hit by a Physical God
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - This item grants 2 MP5 per 10% of your missing Mana

ItemDescription.Description: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Whenever you leave the fountain, you gain 40% movespeed for 15s. You will lose this speed early if you enter combat.

ShortDesc: Increased movement speed when leaving the fountain.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable heals and restores Mana over time.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Rum from Baron Samedi's personal cabinet. This consumable heals 140 Health and 100 Mana over 20 seconds per use. Comes with 3 uses that are refilled if you enter the Fountain, sells for 0 gold.

ShortDesc: Restores Health and Mana over time.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Passive - Only can be bought by Mages, Hunters, Assassins
PASSIVE - Only can be bought by Warriors, Guardians

PASSIVE - GAIN MOBILITY, SACRIFICE DEFENSE & DAMAGE
<font color='#42F46E'>+35% Movement Speed

<font color='#F44242'>-15% Damage Dealt

ShortDesc: Gain Mobility, Sacrifice Defense and Damage

PASSIVE - GAIN DAMAGE, SACRIFICE DEFENSES
Only can be bought by Warriors, Guardians

ShortDesc: Bonus max Health on assists. Gold Bonus on Completing Stacks.

ItemDescription.Description: This consumable increases your Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: This consumable increases your Movement Speed by 18% permanently. This effect disables Movement Speed from Boots or Shoes.

ItemDescription.Description: Cooldown Reduction and Ultimate Activation
Cooldown Reduction and Physical Power
Cooldown Reduction and Protections
Cooldown Reduction and Magical Power
On ultimate use your next ability has no cooldown.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When your Ultimate ability has finished casting, your next non-ultimate ability cast within the next 10s will have no cooldown but will only deal 70% of its normal damage and healing. This can only occur once every 45 seconds.

ShortDesc: On ultimate use your next ability has no cooldown.

ItemDescription.Description: On ultimate use, gain a defensive shield to punish attacks.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When your Ultimate ability has finished casting, you gain a Shield equal to your Protections for 5s. When destroyed, by timing out or being depleted, it explodes and deals Magical damage equal to 50% of the Shields initial Health and slows targets by 25% for 3s. This can only occur once every 45 seconds.

ShortDesc: On ultimate use, gain a defensive shield to punish attacks

ItemDescription.Description: On ultimate use seek out and banish evil.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When your Ultimate ability has finished casting, reveal all enemy gods within 120 units for 8s. While moving towards revealed enemies gain 30% Movement Speed. When first striking a revealed target they take an additional 40 + 30% of your Physical Power. This can only occur once every 45 seconds.

ShortDesc: On ultimate use seek out and banish evil.

ItemDescription.Description: On ultimate use your next damaging ability marks an enemies weak point.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - When your Ultimate ability has finished casting, your next ability or basic attack within 8s that damages an enemy god marks them, increasing the chance you and your allies can land a Critical Strike by 15% for 10 seconds. This can only occur once every 45 seconds.

ShortDesc: On ultimate use your next damaging ability marks an enemies weak point
